comments.en:
This printer doesn't understand PCL 5e, PCL 6, PostScript and so it doesn't work with standard drivers; it can only be driven through a proprietary language. An independent driver was developed in the epsoneplproject.

The driver is IJS based, GNU ghostscript 6.53 onwards or AFPL ghostscript 7.04 onwards is required. This project is not endorsed by nor affiliated with Epson.
